cast.name: 雅各布·皮特斯 Jacob Pitts
瑞内·菲利斯·史密斯 Renée Felice Smith

introduction: This is the story of Detective Gretchen Wolf. Detective Wolf. Detective in training that is. Well ok, it's just the story of Gretchen Wolf...Gretchen Wolf is obsessed with true crime.  Books, tv shows, magazines-- whatever she can get her hands on she watches or reads.  Studying up for her chance to solve a mystery of her own.   So, when the cat next door mysteriously turns up dead, Gretchen has got her first real case.  The investigation will lead her to meet the quirky neighbors that surround her, a dashing police detective and further than she’s been in years.  On her way, she’ll discover there’s a mystery behind every door... possibly even her own.
